WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing as External.  DatePicker uses DateTime.Parse method to parse the text in the textbox.  It looks like DateTime.Parse behaves weirdly with + or - prefixes - unfortunately this is out of the control of the WPF team.
WorkItem.Description:
When plus or minus characters are entered in Calendar text area before day or month, it will decrease/increase day or month in a strange manner just after pressing the Enter key.
Â 
I.e. entering +24.06.2010 and pressing Enter will change the date to 02.06.2010.
WorkItem.Summary: Calendar/DatePicker strange parsing of + and - characters
